definition: branches of a tree/fork of a tree
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
fork (of a tree)/tool made of forked wood

sentences.english: Try to limit the number of headings.
sentences.chinese: 尝试着限制杈枝线的数目。

sentences.english: Write them on the lines as you can see below – one on each line.
sentences.chinese: 把他们分别写到杈枝线上，以便于你能顺着向下进行。

sentences.english: Quadtrees are commonly used for encoding digital images in a compact form.
sentences.chinese: 四杈树一般用来以紧凑格式的方法编码数字图像。

sentences.english: Film mulching and good management in sucker control improved the smoking quality significantly.
sentences.chinese: 地膜覆盖和良好的抹杈管理将提高烟叶香气品质。

sentences.english: I nipped off the side shoots of the plant.
The section through the bifurcation of trachea was the best beginning section for the division of pulmonary segments on the coronal section.
sentences.chinese: 气管杈层面是在冠状断面上划分肺段的最佳开始层面。

definition: root and lower stem of certain plants/classifier for pieces and clumps
variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
span (unit of length based on the width of the expanded human hand)/to span (measure with one's hand)
